Rooms.Name: South Dead End to West Alley
End of a Quiet Back Street

Objects.Name: pie spiced
Objects.Description: A hot spiced pie is here.

Objects.Name: muffler silk
Objects.Description: A strip of silk has been dropped here.

Objects.Name: bandanna red
Objects.Description: A red bandanna has been left here.

Objects.Name: bandana
Objects.Description: A blue bandanna has been left here.

Objects.Name: sack burlap
Objects.Description: A burlap sack has been left here.

Objects.Name: jerkin burlap
Objects.Description: A length of burlap has been left here.

Objects.Name: dagger dark
Objects.Description: A dark-looking dagger has been dropped here.

Objects.Name: dagger ruby
Objects.Description: An exquisitely crafted dagger has been left here.

Objects.Name: shades
Objects.Description: Someone dropped their shades here.

Objects.Name: glasses read
Objects.Description: A pair of glasses are here - be careful, don't step on them!

Objects.Name: ring emerald carved
Objects.Description: An emerald ring has been left here.

Objects.Name: band golden ring
Objects.Description: A beautiful gold ring has been dropped here.

Objects.Name: ring silver wide
Objects.Description: A silver ring has been dropped here.

Objects.Name: water cup water
Objects.Description: A cup has been left here.

Objects.Name: water goblet water
Objects.Description: A goblet is here on the ground.

Objects.Name: water grail water
Objects.Description: A grail has been left on the ground.

Objects.Name: potion
Objects.Description: A glowing potion of invisibility

Objects.Name: potion green bright
Objects.Description: A bright green potion is on the ground.

Objects.Name: potion cure blind
Objects.Description: A potion of cure blindness is fizzing here.

Objects.Name: staff magi glowing
Objects.Description: A glowing staff lays here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Strange signs and sigils cover most of it's length - this must be a fearsomeweapon, indeed.

Objects.Name: hat mage's runed
Objects.Description: A runed hat lies on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks quite ridiculous the way it points at the top and has all thosemoons and stars all over it, but hey, anything for some mana!

Objects.Name: sword short encrypted
Objects.Description: A small glowing sword has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Up and down the lengths of it's blade are strange sigils and signs.  Theymust be where the power emanates from.

Objects.Name: dagger glowing
Objects.Description: A glowing dagger has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It seems to be a plain enough dagger, however the glow which radiates it'slength is near blinding.

Objects.Name: robe magi
Objects.Description: A crumpled pile of cloth lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You sense something strange about this pile of cloth - almost like energy.

Objects.Name: sash magician's
Objects.Description: A length of cloth lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This wide, purple belt made of velvet feels so soft, so smooth and SOpowerful.

Objects.Name: scroll vellum
Objects.Description: A vellum scroll has been left here.

Objects.Name: scroll frayed
Objects.Description: A frayed scroll has been dropped here.

Objects.Name: scroll bound tightly
Objects.Description: A tightly bound scroll has been dropped here.

Objects.Name: boots sneaking
Objects.Description: A pair of sneaking boots have been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: They appear to be made of the softest leather, leather that would almost seemto suck to your feet.  The soles, made of the same leather, are only slightlymore thick from the rest of the boot, but appear to be quite durable.

Objects.Name: cloak shadows
Objects.Description: A shadowy cloak has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It appears that it would cover its wearer completely, obscuring identity andbecause of its dark color, enable the wearer to hide well in shadows.

Objects.Name: hood identity hidden
Objects.Description: A dark hood has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This hood looks menacing even without being worn by anyone.  It appears tohave been tailor-made for those who deal in the darker trades.

Objects.Name: gloves snatching
Objects.Description: A pair of thieven gloves have been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These gloves, made from a soft, supple leather with the finger tips cut outwere made to serve a thief.

Objects.Name: face plate darkened
Objects.Description: A darkened face plate lies discarded on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It appears that when worn, this plate would conceal not only the identity ofthe wearer, but also shade the eyes so that others would not be able to discernwhich direction the wearer might be looking in.

Objects.Name: dirk snake blade
Objects.Description: A strange dirk with a curving blade has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The workmanship on this is superb, its carftsman obviously someone who's lifework is creating beautiful wweapons such as this.

Objects.Name: sword short glowing
Objects.Description: A glowing short sword has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Up and down its entire length, this small sword, almost small enough to becalled a dagger, glows with its own fierce light.

Objects.Name: beer tankard heavy beer
Objects.Description: A heavy tankard has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This thing looks like it could hold enough beer for THREE warriors, but...It appears that you are meant to drink its contents to the finish.

Objects.Name: sword short blade warrior's companion
Objects.Description: A small sword with a wolf's head pommel has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is the blade that no warrior should be without...  At least that is thesales pitch.  It is quite an impressive blade.

Objects.Name: sword deathbringer
Objects.Description: A huge sword made of blazing gold has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Strange that a sword could be made of gold and still maintain an edge - itmust be magically enhanced.

Objects.Name: sword bastard
Objects.Description: A huge bastard sword lies on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It would take a being of great strength to wield this mighty blade - a beingof great strength, indeed.

Objects.Name: knuckles brass
Objects.Description: A pair of brass knuckles have been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: They appear big enough to fit the hand of an ogre, but when you try them onyour own hands, they meld into the sahpe of your fist, fitting perfectly!

Objects.Name: bola
Objects.Description: A black bola has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Just looking at this fine piece of weapontry makes you want to go thumpsomeone on the head!

Objects.Name: club death
Objects.Description: A very huge and very nasty looking club has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Shot through with metal spikes at the end and heavy as an ogre weapon, thisthing looks as impressive as any club could look.  No wonder they named itDeath.

Objects.Name: helm horns
Objects.Description: A huge helm with two bull horns on top has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The two horns curve up menacingly, allowing the wearer to use this helm as asecondary weapon.

Objects.Name: shield agate glowing
Objects.Description: A glowing agate shield has been discarded here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The power emenating from this huge piece of agate carved into a shield is soimmense that it makes the entire thing glow.

Objects.Name: buckler black stone blackstone
Objects.Description: A blackstone buckler has been left on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It appears to be in fine shape - a formidable guard against attack.

Objects.Name: plate chest crested eagle
Objects.Description: A chest plate bearing the crest of an eagle has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The insignia of the eagle is bold and bright, making your heart soar and yourspirit long for the din battle to surround you.

Objects.Name: arm guard spiked
Objects.ShortDescription: a set of spiked arm guards
Objects.Description: A set of arm guards have been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: They look like any other set of arm guards you have seen in the past - well,except for the three-inch spikes which protrude from the lower arm area.

Objects.Name: diamond-chip chip gauntlets
Objects.Description: A pair of gauntlets lie on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These gauntlets are made from a sturdy metal and leather combination, withdiamond chips embedded into the knuckles - made to slice into the opponent'sflesh.

Objects.Name: book Krolar
Objects.Description: Someone left the Book of Krolar here.

Objects.Name: mace
Objects.Description: A mace infused with the power of a God has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It gently glows, inviting you to pick it up, find some poor innocent slob,clobber him on the head repeatedly until the blood and brains that ooze from hishead are so thick and juicy that you cannot even make out his features, whetherhe was a man, woman, human or ogre it doesn't matter you just want to bludgeon,kill, mangle, maim!!!!!......  Now where did all that come from?

Objects.Name: sceptre holy
Objects.Description: Someone in their haste has dropped their sceptre.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It is rumored that every one of Krolar's Holy Sceptres made was forged with asmall piece of the original Sceptre that Krolar used to vanquish the evil AmosTrask, thief and rogue who plagued the men and creatures of Jareth for nearly adecade.

Objects.Name: whip power
Objects.Description: A whip glowing with energy lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Suffused with some unknown God's power, this whip has all the power of a whipand then some.

Objects.Name: book word holy
Objects.Description: A book has been dropped here.

Objects.Name: amulet sacred
Objects.Description: A small clear stone on a chain has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You see nothing all that special about the amulet, however looks can bedeceiving.

Objects.Name: wristlet glory
Objects.Description: A small wristlet has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks almost too small to be worn at all, but opun trying it on, you seethat it is not too small at all.

Objects.Name: ring krolar holy
Objects.Description: A small holy, red ring has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Red stone inset in a black band - wow, this thing is cool!

Objects.Name: robe yellow
Objects.Description: A yellow robe has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks to be in decent enough shape.

Objects.Name: robe bright
Objects.Description: A bright robe lies crumpled in a corner.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It is made from some sort of material that makes the color just seem to jumpout at you!

Objects.Name: robe white
Objects.Description: A beautiful white robe has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: An exquisite robe of the finest fabric.  One of the finest pieces of clothyou have ever seen.  Who in their right mind would sell or leave this thingunaccounted for must be an absolute idiot.  Why would anyone want to leave thislovely piece of fabric behind?

Objects.Name: shield rose
Objects.ShortDescription: a gray shield emblazoned with the Black Rose
Objects.Description: A gray shield of the Deathknight has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The black rose is symbolic of the hatred for all others, the desire to killand maim that a Deathknight has breeded into them as part of their training.

Objects.Name: armor body black onyx
Objects.Description: Someone left their black onyx body armor here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It is not a gleaming black color that this armor exhibits, but a dull, flatblack that seems to soak up all color and joy around it.

Objects.Name: cape rose black
Objects.Description: Some Deathknight left their cape laying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The Black Rose, the traditional symbol of the Deathknight, proudly adorns theback of this cape.

Objects.Name: sword rose black
Objects.ShortDescription: the Sword of the Black Rose
Objects.Description: A Deathknight has left their sword here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The pommel is in the shape of a wilted black rose, the thorns on the stemserving as the grip.

Objects.Name: mace nail studded
Objects.Description: A mean-looking mace with nails studding its length has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This mean looking weapon looks as if it could do more damage than a bastardsword.

Objects.Name: water fountain mermaid water
Objects.Description: An inticately carved fountain with a naked mermaid in the center sprays a fine geyser of clear water into its basin.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Local lore states that a tribe of merfolk live just off the coast near thecity, and that this fountain was a gift to the people of McGintey by the Lordof those merfolk.
